programmes.show_description: WWII thriller. A group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteer to help the French resistance steal a Nazi V2 rocket warhead.
Action thriller with Steven Seagal. A soldier from an elite military force disobeys orders and leads his men on a mission to rescue a friend who has been trapped behind enemy lines.

A five-year-old child recovering from a tonsillectomy is allegedly upset by his mother's behaviour; she denies all vandalism charges.
Stolen property, 'door wiggling', and a fear of roaches come into play when two women fight over alleged vandalism.
Ex-lovers fight over a trip to Italy after their young son gets sick, and the trip is called off.
When a young mother tries to dictate custodial rights to the alleged father of her child, Judge Judy sets her straight.
A car dealership owner defends against a wrongful repossession only to discover that his ex-partner may have been pocketing cash payments.
A man accuses an upstanding businessman of damaging his beloved Mercury Grand Marquis while in the process of stealing the chrome off the vehicle.
A mother claims her fear of homelessness led her to bust down a door and allegedly assault a tenant that was moving out.
A woman with children who have special needs is shocked when her landlord allegedly spies on her and accuses her of dealing drugs.
A young couple demand that their ex-friend pay them back for rent; he countersues for eviction costs after their friend was involved in a shooting.

DI Keogh and DCS Whittaker probe Gary Dean's murder. Insights from Bache and Langley reveal a feud, leading to the Dawsons' conviction.
Detective Keogh and team uncover nurse Kevin Cobb's crimes of rape and manslaughter. Parallel investigations, drug evidence, and a friend's lead reveal all.
Cyclist Moriah Wilson arrived in Austin, Texas, in May 2022 to prepare for the Gravel Locos bike race. One evening, her friend found Wilson had been shot multiple times.
When a young woman goes missing, her lurid call girl image is revealed, and her clients are all suspects in her disappearance.
A twisted killer murdered prostitutes and left their bodies in plain sight.

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Walker investigates misconduct at a racetrack by an owner looking to increase his horse's value.
Drama with Clint Eastwood. A wounded Union soldier is given refuge in a girls' school in the Confederate south during the American Civil War, but his presence provokes jealousy and deceit.
Sam Raimi (Evil Dead) directs this western about a female gunfighter (Sharon Stone) who enters a duelling tournament in the hope of avenging her father's death.
Action thriller with Dolph Lundgren. DEA agent tries to bring down a drug syndicate and rescue an undercover operative who has infiltrated the gang.
Western based on true events. Former outlaw Nathaniel Reed's peaceful existence on the Texas frontier is shattered when a vengeful US Marshal starts hunting him down.

Dodger', the spaniel mix, is at the centre of a custody battle between his owners and the family that cared for him while they were unable to.
Threats of wage garnishment, a guilty plea in an auto accident, and alleged auto theft come into play when a mother sues her son.
A self-proclaimed nosy neighbour cares for a woman's Great Dane and is accused of spaying her unnecessarily.
A woman grieves her loss of musical enjoyment when her violin teacher allegedly sells her a subpar violin.
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases.
A newlywed sues a bridal-shop owner for delivering an allegedly damaged, custom-made wedding gown.
A teenager insists that she took out a restraining on her ex-girlfriend, but her ex-roommate claims they are still dating and sues her for moving costs.
After serving time, a young man must find a safe place to live. Instead, he is kicked out and accused of being disrespectful.
A young boy is asked to leave the courtroom before things heat up in a case involving a mother protesting her son's lockout after a three-day tenancy.

DI Steve Keogh uncovers secrets in Julian Webb's 1994 murder. DCS Kevin Moore, psychiatrist Dr Sohom Das, and reporter Paul Cheston share insights.
Detectives reveal how they solved the 2013 manslaughter of 8-year-old Ayesha Ali by her mother and her lover. A forensic psychologist explains the twisted relationship between the killers.
When Ray Wright suddenly lost contact with his family, they knew something was wrong. Two days later, his brother confronted an intruder in Ray Wright's home.
The body of a man living under an assumed name is found tied to an anchor. Will his watch and tattoo be enough to identify him?
The inspection of a woman's skull found in a lake reveals she was brutally butchered.

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. A female construction worker finds herself in great danger when she files suit against the company owner.
Action adventure directed by Keanu Reeves, starring Tiger Hu Chen. A rebellious martial arts expert risks corrupting his spirit as he joins an illegal fighting circuit to protect his temple.
Adventure with Taron Egerton. A battle-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander launch an audacious rebellion against the corrupt English crown.
